metadata.title: IT Project Manager Resume Template
metadata.description: A professional resume template tailored for IT Project Manager positions, highlighting technical skills and project experience

template_tips: Include metrics and impact where possible
Highlight both technical and soft skills
Keep it to one page unless you have 10+ years of experience

resume_content.summary: Results-driven professional with 7 years of experience in overseeing technology projects and teams. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions and optimizing performance.

experience.title: Senior IT Project Manager
achievements: Led a cross-functional team to deliver a $2M project ahead of schedule, improving client satisfaction score by 20%.
Implemented agile methodologies across the department, reducing project delivery times by 15%.
Enhanced the project tracking system, leading to a 25% increase in efficiency.

experience.title: IT Project Manager
achievements: Managed 10 simultaneous projects with a total budget of $5M, delivering 90% of them on time and within budget.
Developed a new stakeholder engagement plan that improved communication by 30% and reduced project risks.
Awarded 'Project Manager of the Year' in 2020 for outstanding leadership and project outcomes.

experience.title: Junior IT Project Coordinator
achievements: Assisted in coordinating project schedules and budgets, contributing to a 98% success rate of project deliverables.
Streamlined communication protocols, leading to a 15% reduction in project delays.
Supported senior management in implementing a new software system, enhancing team productivity by 20%.

projects.name: Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) System Implementation
projects.description: Led the implementation of a company-wide ERP system to improve data accuracy and business operations efficiency.
